title: 1 files scanned, Jhin error?
body:
I played LoL with no problems, but when new champ came out, it is not working. AGAIN.

I am not on login screen, I am on patcher and it has been few hours since I started it, 
It still says 1 files scanned, 0%

Rito please! Everytime I patch, it always happens!!!!!

**Anyone has solution?**

(This time was lucky, which everytime I do repair, it stops at 32, 33% and had to do crazy stuff that I cant remember to play the game, I wouldnt click repair again. :/ )

replies.body: I've got the same problem. I was fine yesterday but today im stuck on 1 files scanned on the patcher for awhile. I've tried deleting the recommended files to start a repatch but nothing works and when I click repair the client crashes. Please help.

Hey RokDragonz,

Give the solutions in [**this thread**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions) a shot! Let me know how it goes.
